        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>4787</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">cellule galvaniche</string>
            <string language="en">Galvanic cells</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Galvanische Zellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cellules galvaniques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pilhas galvanic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γαλβανικά κύτταρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Células galvánicas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Per questo esperimento interattivo è stata preparata una cellula Daniell. Il programma di studi spiega questo fenomeno.</string>
            <string language="en">For this interactive experiment a Daniell-cell is prepared. The curriculum explains this phenomenon.</string>
          </description>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Für dieses interaktive Experiment wird eine 
Daniell-Zelle vorbereitet. Der Lehrplan erklärt dieses 
Phänomen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pour cette expérience interactive une 
Daniell-cellule est préparée. Le programme d'études explique 
ce phénomène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para esta experiência interativa uma 
Daniell-pilha é preparada. O curriculum explica este fenômeno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Για αυτό το διαλογικό πείραμα ένα δανηελλ-κύτταρο 
προετοιμάζεται. Το πρόγραμμα σπουδών εξηγεί αυτό το 
φαινόμενο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Para este experimento interactivo una 
Daniell-ce'lula está preparada. El plan de estudios explica 
este fenómeno.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
